questions.question: The use of acidified barium nitrate is to test for___

The use of silver nitrate is to test for___

choices.answer: blue precipitate, soluble in excess to form dark blue soln

questions.question: To test for ammonia gas , we use....

choices.answer: damp blue litmus paper which turns blue to red
damp red litmus paper which turns red to blue
damp red litmus paper which turns blue to red
damp red litmus paper which bleaches white

questions.question: Adding sodium hydroxide and then in excess , to iron (II) sulfate will result in.....
To test for hydrogen gas , we use....

choices.answer: a lighted splinter which is extinguished with a pop sound
a glowing splinter which is extinguished with a pop sound
a glowing splinter which reignites with a pop sound
a lighted splinter which reignites with a pop sound

questions.question: To test for oxygen gas , we use....

choices.answer: a lighted splinter which is extinguished with a pop sound
a glowing splinter which is extinguished with a pop sound
a glowing splinter which reignites or glows more brightly

questions.question: Adding aqueous ammonia and then in excess , to iron (III) sulfate will result in.....
